text: "I've Got Bonnie" is a song written by Gerry Goffin and Carole King, which was released by Bobby Rydell in 1962."Honor Roll of Hits", Billboard, April 7, 1962. p. 24. Accessed July 25, 2016.Bobby Rydell - I've Got Bonnie, norwegiancharts.com. Accessed July 25, 2016. The song spent 11 weeks on the Billboard Hot 100 chart, peaking at No. 18,"Bobby Rydell - Chart History - The Hot 100", Billboard.com. Accessed July 25, 2016. while reaching No. 5 on Canada's CHUM Hit Parade. Chart No. 256. title: I've Got Bonnie
